description:
Email marketing is by far the most effective internet marketing method that you can use in an online business.  It doesn't matter if you sell products, services, or simply rely on advertising to make money from your website, email marketing will give you the greatest return on investment in all online business models.  

However, the only way you'll see success with email marketing is if you build effective campaigns, and that's what this course is all about.

Who should take this course?

This course is for internet marketers, bloggers, or small business owners who want to use email marketing to grow their business.  It doesn't matter if you've done email marketing in the past, or if you've never used a email marketing platform before, this course will help you understand everything you need to know.

This course covers:

  • Launching your first email campaign
  • Getting started with email marketing
  • The basics of an email marketing platform
  • Writing effective emails that inspire action
  • Growing your email list to increase revenue potential

What went into producing this course?

In total, this course is about two and a half hours of total content. This course took a tremendous amount of work and has a very high production value. There was a team of three people who worked a total of 100+ hours on this course.

What is this course about?

The core focus is to help you create effective campaigns that will generate more revenue for your business.  A secondary focus of this course is to help you quickly and easily create and launch an email campaign so that you can get started fast.

What kind of materials are included in this course?

This course has three main types of learning materials:

First. are videos that explain general concepts and use animations and call-outs to illustrate key concepts.

Second, are screen recording videos that show you me completing a task in real-time so that you can follow along.

Third, is at the end of every section where you'll have a quiz or exercise to complete to make sure you understand the content that you've reviewed.

Why take this course?

Whether you're an employee at a company, a blogger, or a small business owner, your goal is the same.  You want to increase the revenue that the business generates and email marketing, when used effectively, will help you do just that.  This course will explains how to do that and will make you a better email marketer.
title: Email Marketing 2016: Build and Launch Effective Campaigns
